questions: Q. 1. What does SHGs refer to ?
answers: Ans. Groups of rural poor people who work together in the credit sector.

questions: Q. 2. Who takes the important decisions regarding the savings and loan activities in Self-Help Groups ?
Q. 3. What is the motive of Self Help Groups ?
answers: Ans. The group provides a platform to discuss on variety of social issues such as health, nutrition, etc.

questions: Q. 4. Who is responsible for the repayment of loans in Self Help Groups ?
Q. 5. How many members a typical Self Help Groups should have ?
